lead_paragraph: Herbalife said a database error caused it to overstate its worldwide membership growth in 2015.

headline.print_headline: Herbalife Says Database Error Led to Misstatement on Member Growth
headline.main: Herbalife Says Database Error Led to Misstatement on Member Growth

snippet: Herbalife said a database error caused it to overstate its worldwide membership growth in 2015.
abstract: Herbalife, seller of supplements and weight-loss products, says database error led to them overstating worldwide membership growth for 2015; revises growth to 3.2 percent from 16.7 percent.
